Title: Directs the department of motor vehicles to maintain an internet link of motor vehicle safety recalls, and cause an inquiry to be made thereof upon the annual vehicle inspection
Summary: Directs the department of motor vehicles to maintain an internet link of motor vehicle safety recalls; requires official inspection stations to make an inquiry of such link upon inspection of a vehicle, and if such a recall exists on the vehicle, to advise the owner thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง210-a, amd ยง304, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the provision of notice to owners whose motor vehicles are subject to safety recalls
